item.title: Integration of multi-omics datasets enables molecular classification of COPD
item.description: Multi-omics integration drastically improves unsupervised molecular prediction of COPD; 100% accuracy, subgroups n=6.

item.title: An example journal article
item.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis posuere tellus ac convallis placerat. Proin tincidunt magna sed ex sollicitudin condimentum.

Chuan-Xing Li is an assistant professor at Karolinska Institutet, Sweden. Her major research interests are computational systems biology and systems medicine. The current project is aimed to identify module-based biomarkers by integration analysis of multi-omics data using network modeling approaches, with subsequent module-based sub-phenotyping in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).
